body:
Closes #6497 

Changes proposed in this pull request:

- Created function generateColorPalette() which takes the count of categories in the RSS and generates unique color palette  
- Created function hslToHex() which makes the color palette generated into hex values 
- Assigned color palette to categories 
- Adjusted pie chart making logic to account for assigned color values with 

How to test the feature manually:

Run FreshRSS and go to the Main Statistics Tab, you can from here see that the colors match on each graph

Pull request checklist:

- [x] clear commit messages
- [x] code manually tested
- [x] unit tests written (optional if too hard)
- [x] documentation updated

[Additional information can be found in the documentation](https://github.com/FreshRSS/FreshRSS/tree/edge/docs/en/developers/04_Pull_requests.md).

Thanks 👍🏻 
Please add a line for you in https://github.com/FreshRSS/FreshRSS/blob/edge/CREDITS.md

issue.title: [Feature] Change it so that the colors of each category match on both of the pie charts in the statistics tab
issue.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently, the statistics page pie charts don't match the color between the two pie charts, so, when looking at them, it can be a bit misleading as to what slice corresponds to what, unless you hover your mouse over the individual segments to see what they are or look at the list at the bottom.

**Describe the solution you’d like**
Change it so that the colors for each category are the same on both pie charts.

**Describe alternatives you’ve considered**
None.

**Additional context**

You can see in the following image that the colors for each category don't match on both pie charts.
![image](https://github.com/FreshRSS/FreshRSS/assets/7829231/e6d618ed-41c3-4938-804f-771e5d364524)
